definition: to induce/to promote/to urge/to impel/to bring about/to provoke/to drive (sb to do sth)/to catalyze/to actuate/to contribute to (some development)
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger

sentences.english: They must have strong longings that lures them to attend MEC.
sentences.chinese: 他們一定有很強烈的渴望促使他們參加英語角。

sentences.english: Experts said the study should prompt countries to reconsider how they classify drugs.
sentences.chinese: 專家稱，這項研究應該促使各國重新考慮藥品的分類。

sentences.english: What prompted the making of Bash in the first place?
sentences.chinese: 什麼原因促使您把Bash擺在首位？

sentences.english: All you have to do is start pushing things in the direction you desire.
sentences.chinese: 你要做的就是促使事情像你想要的方向發展。

sentences.english: The supply of non-GM crops is also dwindling, which is forcing prices higher.
sentences.chinese: 非轉基因作物的供應也在減少，這促使價格升高。

sentences.english: Respect her rhythm of progression. This will facilitate the creation of trust.
sentences.chinese: 尊重她的進步，這將促使其對你建立信任感。

sentences.english: These advancements in technology purvey benefits and impel organizations to change.
sentences.chinese: 這些科技的進步提供了好處，從而促使組織的變革。

sentences.english: Microtubules have dominated our think about the mitotic mechanisms.
sentences.chinese: 微管促使我的思考有絲分裂的機制。

sentences.english: Conclusions Application of hyaluronan was helpful restore the anterior chamber and to improve the success of surgery.
sentences.chinese: 結論黏彈劑的應用促使前房恢復，提高手術成功率。

sentences.english: Thee-marketplace expands continuously with the development of E-commerce.
sentences.chinese: 電子商務的發展，促使電子交易市場領域不斷的拓展。

sentences.english: Nations have tried feebly to humanize war.
sentences.chinese: 許多國家想促使戰爭人道化，可是沒有效。

sentences.english: This did not yet tempt them to adventures staking Soviet assets.
sentences.chinese: 這還沒有促使他們把蘇聯的老本拿來孤注一擲。

sentences.english: Is there any special reason that you chose that class?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有一些特殊的原因促使你選擇了這門課程呢？

sentences.english: The script will also drive the execution of the Post-Scripts for the chunk and the file.
sentences.chinese: 該腳本還能促使執行數據塊和文件的後腳本。

sentences.english: Finally, under the pressure management system , the rural government favors in departmental and personal benefits.
sentences.chinese: 壓力型體制又促使鄉鎮利益的部門化與個人化。

sentences.english: Fifth, more and more college Students start their own business-plan.
sentences.chinese: 第五，促使大學生“創業觀念”的產生。

definition: to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to provoke/to irritate/to upset/to stimulate/to excite/irritant
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
